subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Bruins’ Zdeno Chara, the tallest and maybe the meanest player in the N.H.L., has averaged nearly 30 minutes of ice time in the playoffs, the most of any player to advance past the first round.
snippet: The Bruins’ Zdeno Chara, the tallest and maybe the meanest player in the N.H.L., has averaged nearly 30 minutes of ice time in the playoffs, the most of any player to advance past the first round.
